name: svn-automation
description: Clone the repository and checkout the `main` branch

scripts.all:parallel: npm run clean && npx cypress-parallel -d cypress/e2e -a '"--e2e --config-file cypress.config.js"' -t 4 -s all -r cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json
scripts.all:sequential: npm run clean && npx cypress run -r cypress-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=reporter-config.json
scripts.all:parallel:html: npm run all:parallel; npm run report:merge; npm run report:generate
scripts.all:parallel:xml: npm run all:parallel; npm run report:xml
scripts.all:sequential:html: npm run all:sequential; npm run report:merge; npm run report:generate
scripts.all:sequential:xml: npm run all:sequential; npm run report:xml
scripts.news-blog-cy: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/app/newsBlogFetch.cy.js' && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/app/newsBlog.cy.js'
scripts.news-blog-cy:headed: npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/app/newsBlogFetch.cy.js' --headed && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/app/newsBlog.cy.js' --headed
scripts.clean: npx rimraf cypress/results; npx rimraf cypress/downloads; npx rimraf xunit.xml
scripts.prepare: npx husky install && npx husky add .husky/pre-commit 'npx lint-staged'
scripts.report:generate: npx marge cypress/results/report.json --charts true --reportDir cypress/results --reportFilename full-report.html --autoOpen
